ThingDef.label: Tier 1 kit
ThingDef.description: Tier 1 kit with tools used in creating bionics.

ThingDef.label: Tier 2 kit
ThingDef.description: Tier 2 kit with tools used in creating bionics.

ThingDef.label: Tier 3 kit
ThingDef.description: Tier 3 kit with tools used in creating bionics.

ThingDef.label: Wooden jaw
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing jaw with wooden jaw. Smells gross and tastes even worse.

ThingDef.label: wooden shoulder-arm
ThingDef.description: A very poor arm replacement. Looks bad, feels bad, is bad.

ThingDef.label: wooden leg
ThingDef.description: A very poor leg replacement. Looks bad, feels bad, is bad.

ThingDef.label: artificial nose
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing nose. Covers the hole in the face and also allows the user to smell simple substances.

ThingDef.label: artificial ear
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing ear. Covers the hole in the head and also allows the user to hear simple sounds.

ThingDef.label: artificial eye
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing eye. Can detect light and even distance. Like looking through camera but without the colors.

ThingDef.label: simple hydraulic jaw
ThingDef.description: Replaces a missing jaw. It doesn't smell anymore and allows the user to feel simple tastes!

ThingDef.label: simple hydraulic shoulder-arm
ThingDef.description: Replaces missing arm. Way more comfortable and useful than wooden one.

ThingDef.label: simple hydraulic leg
ThingDef.description: Replaces missing leg. Way more comfortable and useful than wooden one.

ThingDef.label: bionic shoulder-arm
ThingDef.description: One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user.

ThingDef.label: bionic leg
ThingDef.description: Bionic leg uses cutting-edge technology to give its owner extreme walking comfort and strength.

ThingDef.label: bionic nose
ThingDef.description: Bionic nose uses advanced technology to give its owner extreme sense of smell.

ThingDef.label: bionic ear
ThingDef.description: An advanced device that allows you to hear normal again.

ThingDef.label: bionic eye
ThingDef.description: Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities.

ThingDef.label: bionic jaw
ThingDef.description: An advanced device that lets you eat normal again, this also comes with a voice modulator.

ThingDef.label: mute jaw
ThingDef.description: This version of the bionic jaw comes without a voice modulator, useful for loud patients.

ThingDef.label: bionic spine
ThingDef.description: This light and impressing device can replace a damaged spine.

ThingDef.label: bionic pelvis
ThingDef.description: This light and impressing device can replace a damaged pelvis.

ThingDef.label: bionic neck
ThingDef.description: This light and impressing device can replace a damaged neck. It has slow transmition speed.

ThingDef.label: medical sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: An artificial sternum, equipped with little blood filters and antibiotics-dispensers to keep the user healthy.

ThingDef.label: drugged sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: An artificial sternum, equipped with little flake-dispensers to keep the user happy. Synthetic liver highly recommended.

ThingDef.label: adrenaline sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: An artificial sternum, equipped with little adrenaline-dispensers to keep the user fit and awake.

ThingDef.label: painkiller sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: An artificial sternum, equipped with little morphine-dispensers to numb the user's pain. Side effects are respiratory ailments.

ThingDef.label: nanomachines ribcage replacement
ThingDef.description: An artificial ribcage, equipped with little nanomachines-dispensers to numb the user's wounds.

ThingDef.label: artificial brain
ThingDef.description: A small device that does its best to keep its user brain to work. Recommended for severe brain damage only. Worth remembering that it limits the brain power! (100%)

ThingDef.label: artificial lung
ThingDef.description: A simple lung replacement. Makes a loud noise.

ThingDef.label: artificial stomach
ThingDef.description: A simple stomach replacement. I wouldn't smell that!

ThingDef.label: artificial liver
ThingDef.description: A Simple blood filter. Not a lot better than normal coffee filter.

ThingDef.label: artificial kidney
ThingDef.description: A Simple kidney replacement. Better than dialysis, trust me!

ThingDef.label: artificial heart
ThingDef.description: A simple pump to keep the bloodstream running.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic shoulder-arm
ThingDef.description: Is it still an arm? It gives the user extremely extreme strength.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic leg
ThingDef.description: Do you remember what walking was? Me neither.

ThingDef.label: exoskeleton
ThingDef.description: A high tech device made out of two components: a light skeletal structure to relieve the back and servomotors to make the user stronger.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic nose
ThingDef.description: Bionic nose uses advanced technology to give its owner extreme sense of smell.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic ear
ThingDef.description: An advanced device that allows you to hear even better now!

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic eye
ThingDef.description: Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities.

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic jaw
ThingDef.description: An advanced device that lets you eat like a monster!

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic spine
ThingDef.description: This light device is awesome!

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic pelvis
ThingDef.description: This light device is awesome!

ThingDef.label: advanced bionic neck
ThingDef.description: This light device is awesome! It has semi-good transition speed.

ThingDef.label: advanced medical sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial sternum, equipped with little blood filters and antibiotics-dispensers to keep the user healthy.

ThingDef.label: advanced drugged sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial sternum, equipped with little flake-dispensers to keep the user happy. Synthetic liver highly recommended.

ThingDef.label: advanced adrenaline sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial sternum, equipped with little adrenaline-dispensers to keep the user fit and awake.

ThingDef.label: advanced painkiller sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial sternum, equipped with little morphine-dispensers to numb the user's pain. Side effects are respiratory ailments.

ThingDef.label: advanced nanomachines ribcage replacement
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial ribcage, equipped with little nanomachines-dispensers to numb the user's wounds.

ThingDef.label: Advanced brain
ThingDef.description: A special device that makes users brain work again and upgrades it slightly. Worth remembering that it limits the brain power! (120%)

ThingDef.label: synthetic lung
ThingDef.description: A high-tech lung replacement. Makes a quiet noise.

ThingDef.label: synthetic stomach
ThingDef.description: A high-tech stomach replacement. It doesn't smell anymore.

ThingDef.label: synthetic liver
ThingDef.description: A high-tech blood filter. It filters the blood really well.

ThingDef.label: synthetic kidney
ThingDef.description: A hight-tech kidney replacement. You can drink again without problems!

ThingDef.label: synthetic heart
ThingDef.description: A high-tech pump to keep the bloodstream running.

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic shoulder-arm
ThingDef.description: This one is F%^$^ng insane.

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic leg
ThingDef.description: I am so fast i live in the dark.

ThingDef.label: ultra exoskeleton
ThingDef.description: I feel as strong as an ant!

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic nose
ThingDef.description: Have someone farted? Oh the raiders...

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic ear
ThingDef.description: I can hear you!

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic eye
ThingDef.description: Isn't it cheating?

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic jaw
ThingDef.description: Hey, chew that sandwich for me!

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic spine
ThingDef.description: Have I always been so light?

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic pelvis
ThingDef.description: Have I always been so light?

ThingDef.label: ultra bionic neck
ThingDef.description: Have I always been so light?

ThingDef.label: ultra medical sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: An ultra artificial sternum, equipped with little blood filters and antibiotics-dispensers to keep the user healthy.

ThingDef.label: ultra drugged sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: An ultra artificial sternum, equipped with little flake-dispensers to keep the user happy. Synthetic liver highly recommended.

ThingDef.label: ultra adrenaline sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: An ultra artificial sternum, equipped with little adrenaline-dispensers to keep the user fit and awake.

ThingDef.label: ultra painkiller sternum replacement
ThingDef.description: An ultra artificial sternum, equipped with little morphine-dispensers to numb the user's pain. Side effects are respiratory ailments.

ThingDef.label: ultra nanomachines ribcage replacement
ThingDef.description: An ultra artificial ribcage, equipped with little nanomachines-dispensers to numb the user's wounds.

ThingDef.label: ultra brain
ThingDef.description: A special device that makes users brain work like a genius. Worth remembering that it limits the brain power! (150%)

ThingDef.label: ultra lung
ThingDef.description: A Ultra-tech lung replacement. Makes a no noise.

ThingDef.label: ultra stomach
ThingDef.description: A Ultra-tech stomach replacement. The farts became Deadly o-O.

ThingDef.label: ultra liver
ThingDef.description: A Ultra-tech blood filter. Is it still blood or something else?.

ThingDef.label: ultra kidney
ThingDef.description: A Ultra-tech kidney replacement. The "drinks" are just water!

ThingDef.label: ultra heart
ThingDef.description: A Ultra-tech pump to keep the bloodstream running.
